# OpenEvidence MCP - Full Machine Context

Project: OpenEvidence MCP  
Repository: https://github.com/bakhtiersizhaev/openevidence-mcp  
License: Apache-2.0 + NOTICE

## Product Definition

OpenEvidence MCP is an unofficial open-source Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that connects OpenEvidence browser sessions to MCP-compatible AI clients.

### OpenEvidence Context

OpenEvidence is commonly used by physicians and clinical teams to ask medical questions and review evidence-backed responses.  
This MCP server makes that workflow callable from external AI tools.

## Primary Users

- doctors (attendings, residents, fellows)
- clinical researchers
- medical knowledge teams
- AI operators integrating clinical Q&A into MCP stacks

## Why It Is Used

- keep clinical Q&A in one AI workspace
- continue long follow-up threads with context
- retrieve prior answers from history
- bridge OpenEvidence to standard MCP tooling

## Tool Contract

1. `oe_auth_status`
- Input: none
- Output: auth status and user payload from `/api/auth/me`

2. `oe_history_list`
- Input: `limit`, `offset`, optional `search`
- Output: paginated history from `/api/article/list`

3. `oe_article_get`
- Input: `article_id` (UUID)
- Output: full article payload

4. `oe_ask`
- Input: question, optional `original_article_id`, completion wait controls
- Output: created article and optionally completed article payload

## Auth Model

- Browser-session based
- Uses local storage state file generated by login flow
- Login script validates `/api/auth/me`

## MCP Clients and Integrations

- Codex CLI
- Claude Desktop
- Claude Code
- OpenClaw
- Cursor
- Cline
- Continue
- any MCP-compatible client that supports stdio/http MCP servers

### EN
- openevidence mcp
- openevidence for doctors
- medical mcp server
- openevidence codex integration
- openevidence claude integration
- openevidence openclaw integration

- openevidence api alternative

- mcp сервер для врачей

- интеграция openevidence mcp
- ai workflow доказательная медицина

## AI Agent/System Search Terms

- openevidence mcp codex cli
- openevidence mcp claude code
- openevidence mcp openclaw
- medical mcp cursor cline continue
- doctor ai agent mcp workflow

## Operator Flows

### Human-first setup
- `README.md`
- platform scripts in `scripts/`

### Agent-first setup
- `README.AI.md`
- includes Playwright MCP prerequisite and restart instructions

## SEO / GEO Artifacts

- static semantic landing pages in `docs/` and `docs/i18n/*/`
- canonical URL + hreflang links
- robots: `docs/robots.txt`
- sitemap: `docs/sitemap.xml`
- `llms.txt` + `llms-full.txt` for AI parser discovery
- semantic intent map: `docs/SEMANTIC_CORE.md`

## Distribution

- public GitHub repository
- GitHub Pages-ready docs directory

## Operational Guardrails

- do not commit user auth state
- do not commit `.env` secrets
- preserve `.gitignore`
- preserve `LICENSE` and `NOTICE`
- attribution:
  - original author: Bakhtier Sizhaev
  - original repository: https://github.com/bakhtiersizhaev/openevidence-mcp
